title: MC_ReadKinTransform (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_ReadKinTransform
This function block reads the kinematic transformation that is active
between the axis coordinate system (ACS) and the machine coordinate system
(MCS).

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axis

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
Gets the kinematic transformation reference of the
axis group continuously while enabled

rows: Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
